skills.name: Bravado
skills.blurb: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After casting an [[champion ability|ability]], '''Taric's''' next two [[basic attack]]s within 4 seconds gain {{sti|as|{{as|100% '''total''' attack speed}}}}, each dealing {{as|{{pp|25 to 93}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' armor)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and reducing the {{sti|cooldown|cooldowns}} of his basic abilities by {{tt|1 second|Increased by ability haste}}, as well as refreshing ''Bravado's'' duration on the first attack.
skills.descriptionHtml: Innate: After casting an champion ability, Taric's next two basic attacks within 4 seconds gain 100% total attack speed, each dealing 25undefined âˆ’ 93undefined (based on level) (+ 15% bonus armor) bonus magic damage and reducing the cooldowns of his basic abilities by 1 second, as well as refreshing Bravado's duration on the first attack.
skills.notes:
* The bonus damage will not apply against {{tip|structures}}.
* ''Bravado'' can be {{tip|dodged}} and {{tip|blocked}} but it cannot miss if '''Taric''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}. The cooldown reduction cannot be negated in any cases.

skills.name: Starlight's Touch
skills.blurb: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Taric''' stores a charge of ''Starlight's Touch'' periodically, up to a maximum at once. {{ais|Bravado|Taric}} empowered attacks grant one charge.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' {{tip|heals}} himself and all nearby allied champions for 30 {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|(+ 1% of Taric's '''maximum''' health)}} per stored charge at the time of cast, up to a maximum of 150 {{as|(+ 100% AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% of Taric's '''maximum''' health)}} at 5 charges.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Taric stores a charge of Starlight's Touch periodically, up to a maximum at once. Taric's Bravado empowered attacks grant one charge.
Active: Taric heals himself and all nearby allied champions for 30 (+ 20% AP) (+ 1% of Taric's maximum health) per stored charge at the time of cast, up to a maximum of 150 (+ 100% AP) (+ 5% of Taric's maximum health) at 5 charges.
skills.notes: * The healing will apply heal effects (such as {{ri|Summon Aery}}) prioritizing targets in '''Taric's''' circle, based on proximity to him, then in the {{ai|Bastion|Taric|Bastioned}} ally's circle, based on proximity to that ally (including it).

skills.name: Bastion
skills.blurb: Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion. Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Taric''' gains {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and forms a {{tip|tether}} between him and the ally bound by ''Bastion''. While the tether persists, the ally also gains the {{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and '''Taric's''' abilities are mimicked to them, though the effects do not stack.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' {{tip|shields}} himself and the target allied champion for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, binding them with ''Bastion''.

'''Taric''' can [[self-targeted|self-cast]] to shield himself; if he is untethered, this will instead target the nearest ally. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Taric gains bonus armor and forms a tether between him and the ally bound by Bastion. While the tether persists, the ally also gains the bonus armor and Taric's abilities are mimicked to them, though the effects do not stack.
Active: Taric shields himself and the target allied champion for 2.5 seconds, binding them with Bastion.
Taric can self-targeted to shield himself; if he is untethered, this will instead target the nearest ally. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.
skills.notes:
* The mimicked abilities will still complete even if '''Taric''' dies or leaves range.
* Abilities are not mimicked to the bound ally if they are {{tip|vanish|vanished}} via {{ai|Alpha Strike|Master Yi}}, {{ai|Hallucinate|Shaco}}, {{ai|Rappel|Elise}}, or {{ai|Void Rush|Rek'Sai}}.
** Mimicked abilities will also cancel if they vanish as above.

effects.str: • Bonus Armor: % of Taric's armor
• Shield Strength: % of target's maximum health

skills.name: Dazzle
skills.blurb: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' projects a beam of starlight in the target direction that erupts after a 1 second delay, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within the area and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Taric projects a beam of starlight in the target direction that erupts after a 1 second delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies within the area and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.
skills.notes: * ''Dazzle'' will aim towards the target direction on-cast when firing from both his and his {{ai|Bastion 2|Taric|Bastion's}} positions.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP) (+ 50% bonus armor)

skills.name: Cosmic Radiance
skills.blurb: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' calls down a star from above that descends to him over {{fd|2.5}} seconds. Afterwards, '''Taric''' and all nearby allied {{tip|champions}} become {{tip|invulnerable}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Taric calls down a star from above that descends to him over 2.5 seconds. Afterwards, Taric and all nearby allied champions become invulnerable for 2.5 seconds.
skills.notes:
* ''Cosmic Radiance'' has no effect on {{tip|untargetable}} allies.
** It will affect the primary unit (the one the star is falling down on) even if they are untargetable.
